original: Lindberg, Skiöld Sten Hilmer, stads-kamrerare, Oskarshamn, f. 18/10/00 i Kärna, östergötl. 1., av G. F. o. Hilda L. G. 31 m. Hagar Margit Siri Johansson. Barn: Sten f. 32, Margareta 36. — Studiex. i Linköp. 19, kan-sliex. i Lund 21. Stadskamr. sed. 41 samt sekr. h. dratselkamm. Tidigare sekr. i stadsfullm. m. fl. ndr o. styrelser, led. av stadsfullm. 31-41, rev. f. stadens räkensk., ordf. o. sekr. i barnav:ndn. Ordf. i avd. 23 av Sv:es kommunaltj imannaförb. 46, presid. i Oskarshamns Rotaryklubb 46, varit verksam inom soc :demokr. part., ABF o. i dr : rör elsen.
translated: Lindberg, Skiöld Sten Hilmer, city treasurer, Oskarshamn, b. 18/10/00 in Kärna, Östergötland. Son of G.F. and Hilda L.G. Married Hagar Margit Siri Johansson in 1931. Children: Sten b. 1932, Margareta b. 1936. Completed studies in Linköping in 1919, and in Lund in 1921 with a degree in Finance. Became city treasurer in 1941 and secretary in the financial management committee. Previously served as secretary in the city council and various other committees, and was a member of the city council from 1931-1941, responsible for auditing the city's accounts. Chairman and secretary in the child welfare committee. Chairman of the local section 23 of the Swedish Municipal Officials' Association in 1946, president of the Oskarshamn Rotary Club in 1946. Active in the Social Democratic Party, ABF (Workers' Educational Association), and other organizations related to politics and education.
